health_insurance_policies.description: ICICI Lombard Elevate Health Insurance Policy - Floater plan covering Umaima Huseini Surti, Sarah Huseini Surti, and Saniya Huseini Surti. Zone A. Sum Insured: ₹10,00,000. Includes add-ons: Room Modifier, Health Check-up, Claim Protector, Tele Consultation, 2-Hour Hospitalization.
health_insurance_policies.comments: Product: ELEVATE | Policy Type: FLOATER | Zone: Zone A | Basic Premium: ₹20,397.48 | Tax: ₹3,671.56 | Insured Members: Umaima Huseini Surti (Self, DOB: 1981-10-21), Sarah Huseini Surti (Daughter, DOB: 2012-05-30), Saniya Huseini Surti (Daughter, DOB: 2014-02-11) | Pre-existing Disease: No | Waiting Periods: PED 3 Years, Specific Diseases 2 Years, Initial 30 Days, Critical Illness 90 Days, Maternity 2 Years
